entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as anxious and still clutching the exam paper. She is also mentioned to be asking Ron for help with her exam.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as stern and has been through this situation before. He tells Hermione that they are not going through every exam afterward.

entities.name: cheering charms
entities.description: Cheering Charms is mentioned as a subject in the exam paper. Hermione expresses uncertainty about her performance on it.

relationships.description: Hermione asks Ron for help with her exam, specifically about whether she should have put in the countercharm for hiccups.
Ron provides advice to Hermione, telling her that they are not going through every exam afterward.
